record.description: One of the many reunion events was a bus tour of Hyde Park/Kenwood community neighboring the University. Alumni and guests were given the opportunity to visit Harper Court, then were brought back to campus for the President's reception at the newly-renovated Cobb Hall.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See UC Magazine, Oct. 1968, p. 13 See UC Magazine, Oct. 1968, p. 12 for caption; photo credit in magazine is Uosis Juodvalkis
